HowToAcknowledge: Please cite Naci et al., 2018 and Kandeepan et al., 2020
Name: Modeling an auditory stimulated brain under altered states of consciousness using the generalized ising model
ReferencesAndLinks: Naci, L., Haugg, A., MacDonald, A., Anello, M., Houldin, E., Naqshbandi, S., Gonzalez-Lara, L. E., Arango, M., Harle, C., Cusack, R., & Owen, A. M. (2018).
